reviewText: This is a beautiful folklore shown.  If you love Mexico, you'll love it.  There is some emphasis on Maya culture and the state of Quintana Roo where the show was performed.

The movie was done just at the beginning of the show, 7-10 years ago and doesn't reflect the performance at the current state/ Now its really much better and clolrfull. The quality of the movie isn't good for HD TV, even its not a DVD quality picture.
